ygData.messageBody:
At 08:35 AM 6/16/99 +1000, you wrote:
>From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
>
>Money can be made.
>
>Just to inspire you all I guess, and show you will oneday get your money
>back perhaps =)
>
>I sell platinum for 100p per stat, and gold for around 50p (some items
>less).
>
>Rare stuff I sell for 150p per attempt ( they supply gem ) and 2000p if I
>succeed.
>
>I currently have over 25,000p in the bank.
>
>Baelish
>Grandmaster Jeweller, Povar.
>
